snippet: President Obama’s plan to bring electricity to millions of Africans is promising, but the outcome depends on how it is carried out and whether it is sustained.
abstract: Editorial heralds Pres Obama's Power Africa initiative, saying it could have major impact in continent where millions live without access to affordable electricity;  maintains agreement will also shore up America's trade and investment relationship with Africa, home to six of world's 10 fastest-growing economies.
lead_paragraph: President Obama’s plan to bring electricity to millions of Africans is promising, but the outcome depends on how it is carried out and whether it is sustained.
